usage: Audience sentiment segments and behavioral cohorts analysis based on social media sentiment patterns

dataMapping.title: Social Sentiment Audience Segments
dataMapping.subtitle: Audience segmentation based on brand sentiment patterns and social media behavior

segments.secondaryLabel: High positive sentiment - Active brand promotion and recommendation
segments.description: Audience segment with consistently positive brand sentiment, high engagement rates, and strong advocacy behaviors across social platforms
segments.actualLabel: Current brand advocacy and positive sentiment rate
insights: Brand advocacy insights (e.g., 'This segment generates 3x more positive word-of-mouth than average', 'Strong correlation between product satisfaction and social advocacy')
Engagement patterns (e.g., 'Peak advocacy activity occurs during product launches and customer success stories', 'Visual content drives 40% higher advocacy engagement')
Amplification behavior (e.g., 'Advocates share brand content 5x more frequently', 'User-generated content from advocates has 60% higher engagement')
risks: Advocacy fatigue from over-targeting may reduce authentic engagement
Negative experiences can quickly convert advocates to detractors
Competitor campaigns may influence advocate sentiment
recommendations: Develop exclusive advocate programs with early access to products and content
Create user-generated content campaigns to amplify authentic advocacy
Implement advocate feedback loops to maintain positive sentiment momentum

metadata.size: Segment size (e.g., '850K users', '12% of total audience', '320K active advocates')
metadata.growth: Growth rate (e.g., '+18% YoY', 'Expanding', '+25% in advocacy activity')

segments.secondaryLabel: Balanced sentiment - Conversion opportunity through targeted messaging
segments.description: Audience segment with neutral brand sentiment, moderate engagement, and potential for positive sentiment conversion through strategic campaign messaging
segments.actualLabel: Current neutral sentiment and engagement rate
segments.forecastedLabel: Forecasted positive sentiment with targeted campaigns
insights: Conversion opportunity insights (e.g., 'Educational content increases positive sentiment by 35% in this segment', 'Product demonstrations drive highest engagement rates')
Messaging preferences (e.g., 'Responds well to value-focused messaging and social proof', 'Visual storytelling increases brand consideration by 28%')
Platform behavior (e.g., 'Most active on Instagram and LinkedIn', 'Prefers authentic, non-promotional content')
risks: Aggressive marketing may push neutral sentiment toward negative
Competitor messaging may capture attention during conversion efforts
Inconsistent brand experiences can prevent positive sentiment development
recommendations: Develop educational content series to build brand awareness and trust
Implement social proof campaigns featuring customer testimonials
Create targeted messaging focused on value proposition and benefits

metadata.size: Segment size (e.g., '1.2M users', '28% of total audience', '680K potential converts')

segments.secondaryLabel: Negative sentiment trend - Reputation management and recovery focus
segments.description: Audience segment showing declining or negative brand sentiment, requiring immediate attention for reputation management and sentiment recovery
segments.actualLabel: Current negative sentiment and detraction rate
segments.targetLabel: Target sentiment recovery and neutralization rate
segments.forecastedLabel: Forecasted sentiment improvement with recovery campaign
insights: Detraction drivers (e.g., 'Customer service issues account for 60% of negative sentiment', 'Product quality concerns drive 25% of negative mentions')
Recovery patterns (e.g., 'Proactive customer service outreach improves sentiment by 40%', 'Transparent communication reduces negative sentiment spread')
Platform-specific issues (e.g., 'Twitter shows highest negative sentiment concentration', 'Review platforms amplify negative experiences')
risks: Negative sentiment may spread to neutral and positive segments
Unaddressed issues can escalate to broader reputation crises
Competitor amplification of negative sentiment through comparative campaigns
recommendations: Implement immediate customer service recovery programs for affected users
Develop transparent communication strategy addressing key concerns
Create targeted content addressing specific issues and demonstrating improvements

metadata.size: Segment size (e.g., '180K users', '4% of total audience', '95K active detractors')
metadata.growth: Growth rate (e.g., '+5% in negative sentiment', 'Concerning', 'Requires immediate attention')
metadata.engagement: Engagement level (e.g., 'High Negative Activity', 'Critical Attention Needed', 'Recovery Opportunity')

summary.topPerformer: Brand Advocates show strongest positive sentiment and highest engagement rates
summary.growthOpportunity: Sentiment Neutral segment shows highest conversion potential with +35% positive sentiment increase opportunity
